item.title: Jeio Prosecco Superiore Brut DOCG - Bisol
item.description:
Bisol's Jeio Prosecco Superiore Brut from the Italian DOCG Valdobbiadene wine region in Veneto is an elegant, tasty and fruity sparkling wine. The sparkling wines of the Jeio line are dedicated to Desiderio "Jeio" Bisol.

In the glass this wine shines in a brilliant straw yellow with straw yellow highlights. The perlage dances vividly to the surface with fine strings of pearls. Wonderful aromas of yellow fruits - especially juicy apple, pear and ripe apricot - reveal the fruity bouquet. On the palate this Italian sparkling wine convinces with its soft and elegant personality. The aromas of the nose are also reflected and underline the distinct fruitiness of this Prosecco.
